translations: 阻挠，妨碍（stymie 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Companies have been stymied by the length of time it takes to reach an agreement.
sentences.translation: 数个公司因耗费很长时间以达成协议而受到阻碍。

sentences.sentence: His action without authorization has stymied the whole plan.
sentences.translation: 他擅自采取的行动已经妨碍了整个计划的实施。

sentences.sentence: The old, newspaper-oriented company has stymied the new one.
sentences.translation: 那个老的，报纸主导的公司已经妨碍了新公司。
